body_html:
Could you please clarify exactly which instructions you are following?

I infer from the error messages above that you are running on Mac. Are you following the instructions here: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac ?

Your output suggests that you are alternating between a CPU-only installation and a GPU enabled installation which is unable to find the Nvidia CUDA8 libraries. Could you double-check the section entitled 'Requirements to run TensorFlow with GPU support' on that page?
body_text:
Could you please clarify exactly which instructions you are following?
I infer from the error messages above that you are running on Mac.  Are you following the instructions here: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac ?
Your output suggests that you are alternating between a CPU-only installation and a GPU enabled installation which is unable to find the Nvidia CUDA8 libraries.  Could you double-check the section entitled 'Requirements to run TensorFlow with GPU support' on that page?
body:
Could you please clarify exactly which instructions you are following?

I infer from the error messages above that you are running on Mac.  Are you following the instructions here: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac ?

Your output suggests that you are alternating between a CPU-only installation and a GPU enabled installation which is unable to find the Nvidia CUDA8 libraries.  Could you double-check the section entitled 'Requirements to run TensorFlow with GPU support' on that page?
